title: AKQA Want Young Digital Makers for Paid Residency.
content:
Fantastic opportunity for a talented Designer to join this exciting and award winning Advertising Agency.

Working in a fast paced and expanding Agency, the right person will be working on everything from brand campaigns across print and digital, to fast moving, news-led digital and Social Media campaigns. A real chance to work on designs that will be seen by millions of people and working with some big names in the publishing and journalism world.

The ideal person will be from an advertising background, with very strong graphic design skills and be able to think conceptually as well as being technically proficient to work on the production side as well. Good Photoshop skills are a must here! This role involves working across all disciplines and would suit someone interested in current events and is confident in every aspect of Design and able to hit the ground running and really pull their weight in this fantastic agency.

If this sounds like the right role for you, get in touch with us: employment@akqa.co.uk
